txt.en: 'Yonder company of Draig-lûth warriors present a threat, not just to my prince's scouting party, but to Rohan as a whole, I believe. Perhaps if we were to weaken their force, the threat would be lessened enough to make it impotent.\n\n'Enter Uvel-cadlus, if you will, and defeat as many of the Dragon-clan's warriors as you can. When you have done so, return to me.'
'Well done, [placeholder]. That should give the Dragon-clan pause. Léofward will be pleased to hear of your courage!'
'Drive back the Dragon-clan, [placeholder]; otherwise, we will fall.'
A company of Dragon-clan warriors is encamped at the northern end of the Gravenwood, marching down from Enedwaith.
Draig-lûth can be found in Uvel-cadlus.\n\nThurbald has asked you to defeat several Dragon-clan warriors.
Thurbald is hiding to the south of Uvel-cadlus.\n\nYou should return to Thurbald with news of your victory.
